body.section: It is often important to identify differences that have resulted from a change to some aspect of a terminology. The IHTSDO Workbench has a facility for identifying a range of differences, known as a "difference report", that can be launched from the Task menu of the Editor's main menu bar.
body.p: The business process that produces the difference report requests some information from the user, then calculates the differences and displays them in the List tabbed pane of the component panel. The workbench needs to know the two sources to compare. These are solicited from the user in the form of paths. The criterion on which the differences should be calculated is also sought.
